EmailTemplate.name: New PMT Private Equity Cases
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case(s) Added to PMT Private Equity Queue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello PMT Infrastructure,
There have been new Case(s) added to the PMT Infrastructure Queue. Click the link below to go directly to the Queue.
https://na57.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Case/list?filterName=00B0b000007DBDBEA4
Thanks,
Salesforce Support Team
